data.name: SkydiveSim
data.description:
*****In this latest 2.0 version of SkydiveSim, we are thrilled to introduce the much-anticipated cutaway and reserve functionalities. Responding to the enthusiastic requests from the skydiving community, we've included these features to enhance the training and entertainment experience. Now, skydivers and enthusiasts can practice handling cutaways and deploying reserves in a relaxed virtual environment.

One of the most exciting upcoming features is the introduction of canopy malfunctions. This addition will be a game-changer for training, as students can now visualize and identify malfunctions in a controlled environment. By simulating canopy malfunctions, users can learn to stay calm and make the right decisions under the canopy, contributing to a safer and more prepared skydiving community.*****

SkydiveSim brings the thrill of skydiving and BASE jumping to your Oculus Quest headset. No more waiting on weather on bad weather days. Put on your headset and choose from our gorgeous levels. Jump from a plane 10,000 feet above ground. Challenge yourself to go through the free fall rings. Then pull your ripcord and fly under the canopy and finally work on your accuracy and  land on the target. You don't need a plane ride back up, just repeat in the same scene or choose another one of our exotics environments to jump into.
Want even more  excitement? BASE jump from top of the buildings, windmills and light towers, pull the ripcord and navigate to the ground!

changelog.change_log:
* Swooping feature is now in beta! Gain points as you swoop across the ground or while flying in close proximity to mountains and other objects. (You can only use toggles at this time)
* Optimization for Quest 3 and new UI controller map to reflect the new Quest 3 Headset.
* Better overall performance and smooth playability in all scenes.
* You can now change the Quality settings even in Quest standalone for clearer images. (Too high of settings may impact frame rates in some scenes)
* Bug fixes and other enhancements.

* We are excited to announce the introduction of cutaway and reserve in this 2.0 version of SkydiveSim! In future updates, we will be adding canopy malfunctions which has been a very popular request.
* You can now turn off the front hackie and use the advanced hackie which is set up where the hackie is in real life.
* Fine-tuned Expert and Advanced canopies
* Longer and more natural  canopy opening animation
* BASE jump canopies now open faster
* Enhancements to the menus UI

This update enhances canopy physics and controls.

Added ability to track. Tracking is used to separate skydivers before they open their canopy to avoid mid-air collision. This new feature in SkydiveSim can help instructors even further with their students by practicing and visualizing all aspects of a jump before trying it in real life.
Tracking is also an amazingly fun type of skydive as you get to fly across the Dropzone.

Added ability to pitch and bank to the left and right during free fall. This new feature adds even more realism as the player can now shift to the left and right quickly by using same style body and hand positioning as they would in real life. This feature also comes in handy when you are using the new tracking feature and need to make quick adjustments to your heading.

Audio mixer can now be accessed from the pause menu. Also added volume control for Voice to the mixer for multiplayer sessions.
As SkydiveSim gets more popular, more and more users are trying the multiplayer feature. Having the Audio mixer readily available in the pause menu, players can now easily adjust audio levels of Music, SFX, and Multiplayer Voice so they can hear each other with ease.

Leaderboards now show more users for more engagement. Competitive scores are now even more engaging in SkydiveSim.

Master Canopy Flight with Realistic Physics: SkydiveSim's physics engine has been reimagined to capture the nuances of canopy flight. Feel the wind in your parachute as you gain full control over your descent, delivering an authentic and captivating virtual experience.

Responsive Parachute Presets for Precision Maneuvers: Explore the most responsive virtual parachute ever designed! Choose from four new presets, each presenting a unique challenge. Land with precision on the main target or test your accuracy with bonus targets in the water.

Enhanced Multiplayer Canopy Experience: Canopy flight is better when shared! Join friends or meet fellow skydivers as if you are in the same Drop Zone, fostering a sense of camaraderie as you navigate the skies together with precision and grace.

Optimized Quality Settings for Your Device: Tailor your gaming experience with quality settings designed specifically for your device. Whether you're on a high-end gaming rig or a more modest system, enjoy seamless and visually stunning environments.

Musical Serenity: Elevate your immersive experience with our new music player feature. Choose tunes to accompany your controlled descent, adding a personalized soundtrack to your virtual skydiving adventure.

Breathtaking Visual Enhancements: Immerse yourself in visually stunning environments as you gracefully descend. The Liberty Island visuals are now based on real-world counterparts, providing an added layer of authenticity to your canopy journey.

Fine-tuning canopy physics
Steeper canopy
Canopy turns enhancements
Multiplayer ability to turn on/off voice and mic
Advanced Hackie for skydivers (pull by right hip)
Main music theme change
Visual enhancements
